title: Your fave illustration of Franklin’s kite experiment is likely riddled with errors
description: Most date from 19th century and were heavily influenced by Joseph Priestley's 1767 account.

title: Widespread FBI abuse of foreign spy law sets off “alarm bells,” tech group says
description: Section 702 debate rages after another FISA Court opinion is unclassified.

title: Netflix crackdown on account sharing hits US with $8 fee for each extra user
description: "Your Netflix account is for you and the people you live with," email tells users.

title: Fake Pentagon “explosion” photo sows confusion on Twitter
description: Incident shows weakness of Twitter's verification system, speed of misinformation.

title: The $1,600 Dyson 360 Vis Nav promises to be the world’s most powerful robovac
description: Dyson's new robovac has a unique design, both inside and out.

title: Woman with untreated TB still on the lam three months after arrest warrant
description: "If we knew where she was, she would be in custody."

title: Study: People think undermining democracy is ok if others do it first
description: Merely thinking the other guys wreck democracy raises support for wrecking democracy.

title: Google bans Downloader app after TV firms complain it can load a pirate website
description: "It's a ridiculous claim and abuse of the DMCA," Downloader app developer says.

title: Adobe Photoshop’s new “Generative Fill” AI tool lets you manipulate photos with text
description: Firefly-powered AI generations match image perspective, lighting, and style.

title: Meta has no choice but to sell Giphy at $262M loss to Shutterstock
description: With UK forcing a sale and GIFs losing popularity, Meta was bound to take a hit.

title: Unexpected 3DS update breaks many common homebrew hacking methods
description: Latest "stability" update comes months after the 3DS eShop shut down.

title: Built-in ChatGPT-driven Copilot will transform Windows 11 starting in June
description: Copilot is coming alongside another batch of new Windows 11 features this year.

title: Activision shuts down popular fan servers for legacy Call of Duty games
description: Meanwhile, official servers see reports of massive hacking and security issues.

title: Ford reverses plan to ditch AM radio after congressional attention
description: Pending legislation would mandate an AM radio in all new cars.

title: Congress wants AM radio in all new cars—trade groups say that’s a mistake
description: Congress wants to force AM into every new car for emergency alerts.

title: Cadillac will electrify its most excessive SUV, the Escalade
description: Swapping a V8 for electric power should prove a big upgrade for this behemoth.

title: Review: Nvidia’s $399 RTX 4060 Ti is a step forward, but only a small one
description: Most games perform better, but the gains are smaller than we're used to.

title: End of an era: CD Baby stops distributing artists’ CDs, vinyl, and other goods
description: After more than 25 years, the digital-focused service is closing its warehouse.
